content: short row at the corners keep the points sharp and some double decreases keep the eyelets centered for those dishcloth knitters who have a touch of the ocd like i do this cloth is much more symmetrical than standard cloths and the principles can be applied to any corner to corner dish cloth update 12/19/08 in the new version of this pattern i have * removed the back ground image to use less ink and to make it easier to read * integrated the pattern note into the pattern proper so it isn t missed * moved the instructions for the pointy corners to it s own sub section clarified that they are short row and provided a link to an online resource for short row instruction for those who don t know what short row are
